entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Yet you refuse to develop a NATIONAL plan-You force States to handle the crisis individually,making them bid agnst ea other for PPE/equipmt driving prices up-You wasted 10 WEEKS calling COVID19 a Dem hoax which allowed it to spread-20K Americans are dead-YOU are the disaster
